name: Color Bouncing
description:
* Over 100 custom levels of bounce-tapping action!
* Levels designed by a multi-award-winning designer who let the fame get to his head, got cut down by reality, and is now a normal person again
* Balls
* Scoodles of variety! Moving blocks, wacky shapes, don't-tap squares... it's a fiesta in there, lemme tell ya
* Levels with multiple balls (this is 2018 after all!)
